title: (x) enter shikari font - Greek capitals, scientific symbols, suggestions for faux Cyrillics {Riccardo}
content:
anyone know the font that this band used? Or any other russian/communist looking fonts?  
Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120305235317im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_6401.png)
author: toddslater

comments.content:
They're just Greek capitals/scientific symbols:  
Sigma, Pi, T, Sigma, Prescription Take, etc.

But you could find something interesting here:  
 [http://www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=205](http://web.archive.org/web/20120305235317/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=205 "http://www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=205")
